workflow.name: Generate & publish SEO blog posts to Blogger using OpenRouter AI & Mediastack News
workflow.description:
This n8n workflow automates the entire pipeline of generating, formatting, and publishing SEO-rich blog posts to a Blogger site‚Äîideal for auto service businesses.

What it does:

‚è± Runs on a schedule via the Schedule Trigger

üì∞ Fetches trending news from Mediastack (technology category)

üñº Generates relevant images using the Pexels API

üß† Creates SEO-optimized content using AI agents (LangChain & OpenRouter)

üìù Formats content into Blogger-compatible HTML, including title, metadata, images, FAQs, and internal linking

üîÑ Posts directly to Blogger via authenticated Google Blogger API

üì¢ Sends Telegram notifications with previews and publishing confirmations

üîê Uses secure credentials (no hardcoded API keys)

Ideal For:

Bloggers and marketers looking to automate content creation

Auto repair, dealership, or detailing businesses maintaining a content strategy

Agencies managing multiple Blogger-based SEO campaigns

parameters.text:
=Success! Your blog post was created at {{ $now }} 
title : {{ $('Parsing').item.json.title }}

=Act as a professional blogger, SEO specialist, and generative engine optimization (GEO) expert. Write a comprehensive, data-driven, and easy-to-follow WordPress blog post that is 1,000 words long. Follow the structure and guidelines below strictly, while using advanced generative techniques to ensure the content is engaging, personalized, and semantically optimized for search engines. SEO Requirements: Blog Post Title: {{ $('Parsing').first().json.title }} Focus Keyword: {{ $('Parsing').first().json.meta }} Related keywords : {{ $('Parsing').first().json.meta }} Highlight the focus keyword ‚Äú {{ $('Parsing').first().json.meta }} ‚Äú by making the font bold and Link the focus keyword to ‚Äò https://gdroid.tn ‚Äò using an HTML hyperlink, Use the following exact HTML format for the focus keyword: {{ $('Parsing').first().json.meta }} `. Highlight the related keyword ‚Äú {{ $('Parsing').first().json.meta }} ‚Äú by making the font bold and Link the related keyword to ‚Äò https://gdroid.tn ‚Äò using an HTML hyperlink, Use the following exact HTML format for the focus keyword: {{ $('Parsing').first().json.meta }}`. Integrate the focus keyword naturally throughout the post, particularly in the headline, subheadings, and within the first 100 words.Use semantic variations and related keywords to enhance search engine context and relevance. Content Structure: Start with an intriguing, data-backed question that captures the reader‚Äôs attention immediately.Ensure the question is relevant to ‚ÄúYour recipe,‚Äù challenges common beliefs, and evokes curiosity. Seamlessly incorporate the focus keyword within the first 100 words. Ingredients List (H2): Provide a clear, organized list of ingredients, including suggestions for potential substitutions.Use engaging language and sensory descriptions to enhance reader interest. Timing (H2): Detail the preparation, cooking, and total time required. Include any data or comparisons that can add context (e.g., ‚Äú90 minutes, which is 20% less time than the average recipe‚Äù). Step-by-Step Instructions (H3 for each step): Present clear, easy-to-follow steps with dynamic and personalized language. Include actionable tips and tricks that add value, ensuring each step feels engaging and tailored. Nutritional Information (H2): Provide comprehensive nutritional details, citing data insights where applicable. Healthier Alternatives for the Recipe (H2): Suggest modifications or ingredient swaps that maintain flavor while enhancing nutritional benefits. Offer creative ideas to make the recipe adaptable for various dietary needs. Serving Suggestions (H2): Offer creative, appealing serving suggestions that resonate with a broad audience. Incorporate personalized tips that make the dish more inviting and versatile. Common Mistakes to Avoid (H2): List typical pitfalls with insights on how to avoid them.Use a mix of data insights and experiential advice to enhance credibility. Storing Tips for the Recipe (H2): Provide practical advice on storing leftovers or prepping ingredients ahead of time. Emphasize best practices for maintaining freshness and flavor. Conclusion (H2): Summarize the key points of the recipe. Include a dynamic call-to-action that invites readers to try the recipe, share feedback, or explore similar posts. FAQs (H2): Create a set of anticipated questions and clear, engaging answers to address common reader concerns.Ensure the FAQs add further value by clarifying any potential ambiguities in the post. Additional Instructions: Tone & Style: Write in a friendly, easy-to-follow tone. The content should be engaging, informative, and trustworthy.Personalization & Data Insights: Leverage generative AI capabilities to infuse personalized recommendations and data-driven insights. Tailor content to meet diverse reader needs. Semantic Richness: Optimize for semantic search by using structured data, related keywords, and natural language variations. User Engagement: Incorporate interactive elements or suggestions for readers to explore additional content (e.g., links to related recipes or cooking tips). Quality & Readability: Prioritize clarity, logical flow, and readability. Ensure that every section is useful and maintains high-quality standards. Begin directly with the content and avoid any preambles such as 'Here's the article' or similar., write the heading without starting with ‚Äòsection‚Äò Only output the HTML content without preamble or further explanation. Generate WordPress-compatible HTML for a blog post based on the provided content. ### CONTENT PROCESSING: - Process all content - Preserve all original facts, information, and URLs - Format according to the specifications below ### REQUIRED STRUCTURE (IN THIS ORDER): 1. Title (H2) 2. Estimated reading time 3. Key takeaways (3-5 bullet points) 4. Table of contents (linked to all headings) 5. Main content (with proper heading hierarchy) ### STYLING REQUIREMENTS: - Style Override: Include a style section with !important declarations - Links: All hyperlinks, TOC items, and FAQ questions must be #00c2ff (blue) - Headings: All headings need a bottom border in #00c2ff with padding - Spacing: Add

between each major section ### ENGAGEMENT FORMATTING: - Use bold, italics, bullet points, quotes, and highlighting for emphasis - Create proper paragraph structure with appropriate line breaks - NO emojis allowed - Use whitespace strategically for readability ### Blogger COMPATIBILITY: - Use Blogger block - Add heading IDs starting with "h-" for better TOC linking - Ensure all styles use !important to override theme styles DO NOT include any explanations, code tags, or comments. Output ONLY the raw HTML.

=**Create a slug, blog post title, and meta description for the following blog post:**
{{ $json.data[0].title }}
**Slug Guidelines:**
- Keep it concise (4-5 words maximum).
- Include the primary keyword related to recruitment or HR.
- Use hyphens to separate words.
- Avoid unnecessary words, articles, or prepositions.
- Ensure it reflects the main topic of the blog post.
- Make it readable and relevant for both users and search engines.

**Title Guidelines:**
- Avoid AI words like "Transform" or "Revolutionize" and similar overused terms.
- Avoid using a colon (:) in the title.
- Never structure it as a primary/secondary title separated by a colon.
- Include the primary keyword related to recruitment or HR (e.g., 'AI in recruitment' or 'talent acquisition trends').
- Clearly inform users what they can expect from reading the blog post.
- Be concise and engaging, ideally 50-60 characters long.
- Incorporate power words that appeal to HR professionals and recruiters.

**Meta Description Guidelines:**
- Avoid AI words like "Transform" or "Revolutionize" and similar overused terms.
- Be concise: Limit to 150-160 characters to ensure full visibility in search results.
- Include keywords: Naturally incorporate primary recruitment-related keywords to enhance relevance and visibility.
- Provide value: Clearly convey the benefits or insights readers will gain from the article.
- Be engaging: Use action-oriented language or a thought-provoking question to encourage clicks.
- Align with content: Accurately reflect the blog post's content to meet user expectations and reduce bounce rates.
- Highlight expertise: Subtly emphasize SocialFind's authority in the recruitment field.

Your output must be a single valid JSON object with these 3 fields:
-slug: The slug
-title: The blog post title
-meta: The meta description  

Each should be presented without any additional text, explanation, quotation marks, or formatting.
